DOC.brief_summary: This extension study will assess the safety and efficacy of AIN457 versus placebo for maintaining uveitis suppression when reducing systemic immunosuppression
DOC.brief_title: Safety and Efficacy of AIN457 in Patients With Quiescent Non-infectious Uveitis
DOC.criteria: Patients who have completed the entire treatment period of the 24 week core study Inability or unwillingness to undergo repeated subcutaneous injections; inability to comply with study or followup procedures; any medical or psychiatric condition which, in the investigator's opinion wouldpreclude the participant from adhering to the protocol or completing the study per protocol. Other protocoldefined inclusion/exclusion criteria may apply.
DOC.keyword: NVS Definition: Words or phrases that best describe the protocol. Keywords help users find studies in the database.

Examples: Heart failure, aliskiren, heart attack, cardiovascular diseases
